channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Three Guesses
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (David Goodis)
item.description: Detective Frey came in end saw Duggin lying dead, and he figured he'd go out and Jo big things. He went out and threw his weight around. Doing big things? You figure that one out!
